muhasibat.title: Accounting Services
content: Submission of tax and financial reports
Preparation of documents according to daily accounting requirements
description1: Recording all financial transactions of your company, accounting all economic activities
Preparation and processing of initial documents
Submission of tax and financial reports
Accounting of fixed assets, depreciation, write-offs, and organizing inventory
Execution of banking transactions, internal and external transfers, tax and other budget payments
Customs payments, registration of contracts, monitoring customs declarations, etc.
Establishment of payroll and bonus systems, payroll calculation and payments
Inventory accounting, formation of material cost, incoming and outgoing materials, write-offs, etc.
Cash operations accounting, tracking and controlling cash flow

vergi.title: Tax Services
description1: Accounting of all tax operations of your company
Execution of documentation required by tax authorities
Submission of tax reports and all types of declarations
Analysis of previous period tax reports, possible refunds analysis and application
Analysis of tax risks, elimination of existing risks, providing tax consultations
Representation and defense of your company during desk and field tax audits

audit.title: Audit Services
content: Audit as a member of the Chamber of Auditors of Azerbaijan
Internal audit and tax risk checks
description1: Conducting audit as an official member of the Chamber of Auditors of Azerbaijan
Internal audit before tax inspections, identifying and resolving tax risks
Analysis, clarification, correction and resubmission of all types of tax declarations
Human Resources audit, preparation of required documents, resolving deficiencies

hr.title: HR Services
description1: Establishment of Human Resources accounting
Management of HR documentation, attendance, hiring, changes, dismissals, vacations, etc.
EMAS inspection, identifying and correcting discrepancies between documents, facts and portal
Human Resources audit, preparation of necessary documents, elimination of deficiencies

ucot.title: Accounting Software Implementation
description1: Setting up accounting and tax records in your existing software
Development and implementation of 1C software from scratch for accounting and tax records
Conducting 1C software trainings and providing support for your existing software

huquq.title: Legal Services
description1: Company formation, changes in registration data, share transactions
Tax and accounting related court disputes
Preparation of migration documents
Contract preparation, review, and risk analysis
Company formation, liquidation and consultations
Company formation and consultation services for foreign citizens

items.title: Customer Satisfaction:
items.content: Meeting clients’ financial needs and exceeding their expectations.

items.title: Reliable Service:
items.content: Protecting client data and implementing security measures in accounting systems.

items.title: Revenue Growth:
items.content: Providing strategic advice to optimize your business financial outcomes and increase your revenue.

items.title: Quality Service:
items.content: Saving your time by providing professional and trustworthy service to build client confidence.

items.title: Transparency:
items.content: Ensuring transparency in accounting and audit processes, providing clear and comprehensible reports to clients.

servicesCenter.title: Global Finance Company
servicesCenter.description: Since 2018, we have provided maximum support with a personalized approach to every client. We have worked with clients from various sectors — services, sales, manufacturing, construction, etc. We have established accounting systems and delivered quality services in auditing and taxation.

items.title: Training Topics
items.description: Training programs rich in practical and theoretical knowledge.

items.title: Our Trainers
items.description: Learn from professional and experienced specialists.

program1.title: "Become an Accountant" Program
program1.description: In this training, you will acquire skills to work independently as an accountant. The training is conducted by 4 professional trainers with over 10 years of practical experience. You can find information about our trainers on the website. As the training program suggests, you can work freely as an accountant in any company or improve your qualifications. The training is held twice a week for 2 hours each, lasting 2.5 months. We have a 10-minute coffee break at the end of each hour.

program2.title: HR Trainings
program2.description: In this training, you will learn to work independently as an HR specialist and improve your knowledge. The training is conducted by 2 professional trainers with over 15 years of experience. It takes place twice a week for 2 hours each, lasting 2 months. There is a 10-minute coffee break at the end of each hour.

program3.title: Internship Program
program3.description: In this program, you will be invited to our company and participate in the company's operational processes, gaining practical experience.

list.name: Dünya Nabiyeva
list.info: Dünya has over 15 years of experience as head of HR departments in private and public companies. She holds certifications such as 'Personal Development and Training' (Istanbul Esenyurt University), 'Human Resource Management' (SHRM-CP), 'Achieving Happiness and Success' (PMI), and 'Family and Labor Mediator' (Azerbaijan Justice Academy).

list.name: Elvin Naghiyev
list.info: With over 15 years of experience in various fields, Elvin has worked as chief accountant, finance director, audit department head, and auditor. He has represented companies in numerous tax inspections and established accounting systems in tax and finance.

list.name: Ilaha Garayeva
list.info: Since 2014, Ilaha has worked as an accountant and chief accountant in several large companies. She has practical experience in import-export, services, sales, and production enterprises.

list.name: Elmar Agamirzayev
list.info: Elmar has local and international (USA) education and experience, having worked as accountant, chief accountant, and finance director in several large companies for over 15 years.
